item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." -- Confucius

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "There is more to sex appeal than just measurements. I don't need a bedroom to prove my womanliness. I can convey just as much sex appeal, picking apples off a tree or standing in the rain." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The beauty of a woman is not in the clothes she wears, the figure that she carries, or the way she combs her hair. The beauty of a woman is seen in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides. True beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It's the caring that she lovingly gives, the passion that she shows & the beauty of a woman only grows with passing years." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "If I’m honest I have to tell you I still read fairy-tales and I like them best of all." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by audrey hepburn
item.description: "You can tell more about a person by what he says about others than you can by what others say about him." -- audrey hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Pick the day. Enjoy it - to the hilt. The day as it comes. People as they come... The past, I think, has helped me appreciate the present, and I don't want to spoil any of it by fretting about the future." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mole,but true beauty in a Woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives, the passion that she knows." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Living is like tearing through a museum. Not until later do you really start absorbing what you saw, thinking about it, looking it up in a book, and remembering - because you can't take it in all at once." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description:
"I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel."
(<i>Audrey Hepburn: Many-Sided Charmer</i>, LIFE Magazine, December 7, 1953)" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Why change? Everyone has his own style. When you have found it, you should stick to it." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I decided, very early on, just to accept life unconditionally; I never expected it to do anything special for me, yet I seemed to accomplish far more than I had ever hoped. Most of the time it just happened to me without my ever seeking it." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "It's that wonderful old-fashioned idea that others come first and you come second. This was the whole ethic by which I was brought up. Others matter more than you do, so 'don't fuss, dear; get on with it'." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I've been lucky. Opportunities don't often come along. So, when they do, you have to grab them." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "Make-up can only make you look pretty on the outside but it doesn't help if your ugly on the inside. Unless you eat the make-up." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I don’t take my life seriously, but I do take what I do – in my life – seriously -" -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Maria Diana add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "I believe in manicures. I believe in overdressing. I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipstick. I believe in pink. I believe happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day, and... I believe in miracles." -- Audrey Hepburn
